Mike,

Thanks for the mention of my MiniBox....

I'm changing my website today, but will let you all know in advance 
that the Box will remain at the $399 introductory price. There will 
NOT be an increase after the first of the year.

I want it to be affordable for those who can't build their own. 
During a recent session I asked the box what it should be sold for. 
It replied. "always 399". 

So it will remain at $399.

Merry Christmas to all,
Ron
